s: See what employees say it's like to work at Edgewell Personal Care. Salaries, reviews, and more - all posted by employees working at Edgewell Personal Care.

Innovation. Quality. Sustainability. With nearly a century and a half of experience in innovation and decades of category leadership, our custom brands group is one of the most trusted, recognized, and awarded suppliers of store-brand razors in the world.

Our portfolio of over 25 brands includes Schick®, Wilkinson Sword®, Edge®, Skintimate®, Playtex®, Stayfree®, Carefree®, o.b.®, Banana Boat®, Hawaiian Tropic®, Bulldog®, Jack Black®, and Wet Ones®. These brands touch the lives of our consumers in more than 50 countries.
